recordLookups.description: Get OrderSummary for the record Id passed
recordLookups.name: Get_Order_Summary_Object
recordLookups.label: Get Order Summary

fields.name: Discount_Warning_Message
fields.fieldText: Please keep in mind to issue refunds at least 24 Hrs after the payment is captured to avoid refund failures from the bank.

fields.name: Error_Output_Message
fields.fieldText:
{!errorMessageTitle}

{!errorMessage}

fields.name: ConfirmationHeading
fields.fieldText: You're all set! The discount succeeded.

fields.name: ProductSelectionHeading
fields.fieldText: Select from these available items to discount.

fields.name: DiscountSelectionHeading
fields.fieldText: Select the discount type, value, and reason.

textTemplates.name: Error_Output_Invocable_Action_Message
textTemplates.text: Close this window and check the order summary page for updated information.

textTemplates.name: Error_Output_NoItemsToDiscount
textTemplates.text: When an order has items you can discount, you'll find them here.

textTemplates.name: Error_Output_Unmanaged_Order_Message
textTemplates.text: You can only run this flow on a managed order summary.

textTemplates.name: Error_Output_Unmanaged_Order_Title
textTemplates.text: The specified order summary is unmanaged.

textTemplates.name: Error_Output_Wrong_Entity
textTemplates.text: This is where you'd discount items from an order. To discount an order, start from the order summary page.

textTemplates.name: Error_Output_Wrong_Entity_Header
textTemplates.text: We don't think you meant to come here.

variables.description: used to set the discount amount type based on whether the order is VAT
variables.name: discountAmountType

value.stringValue: You can only run this flow after the payment capture.
